fs.fibu2.data.model
Class ExtremeSeparator

java.lang.Object
  fs.fibu2.data.model.ExtremeSeparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntrySeparator
public class ExtremeSeparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntrySeparator

An extreme separator is a separator which comes before all entries or after all entries. Optionally, a filter can be given when creating the separator.

Author:
Simon Hampe

Constructor Detail

ExtremeSeparator

public ExtremeSeparator(java.lang.String description,
                        boolean isBeforeAll)
Creates a ExtremeSeparator with a short description which is displayed as its name

Parameters:
description - The name of this separator
isBeforeAll - Whether this is a separator at the beginning of all entry lists. If false, it is placed at the end.
